sentences: Hanka Paldum (Serbo-Croatian Cyrillic: Ханка Палдум; born 28 April 1956) is a Bosnian sevdalinka singer and founder of the record label Sarajevo Disk.

sentences: She is regarded as one of the best female sevdah performers of the 20th century and is popular in her home country of Bosnia as well as in the rest of the former Yugoslavia.
